review: Wow!  This is my first attempt in using this type of device, and I think I hit the jackpot.  It is so easy to install, and with my Prime membership, I have access to a ton of movies, TV series and music to entertain and enjoy.  My only regret is that I didn't buy it sooner.Highly recommended.
author: James A Whitaker

review: I liked my fire tv, but it had to be replaced after about 3 weeks.  I am not real happy that I can't mirror my kindle t the second screen.  There should be better explanations of compatibility with different pieces of equipment.

review: AppleTV is much more intuitive, easy to integrate, and streams better at my house. I love almost everything Amazon, but this one has let me down so far. I am ready for Sling to move to my Samsung SmartTV.

review: dont like how i have to pay for everything that i want to see even with prime..free items only consist of old movies....NONE of my favorite tv shows were free even old seasons..

review: After struggling with Sony WiFi Blu Ray and never being able to get a connection it has really been a relief to get even a better picture on my 1080 than I got from Uverse and Comcast. Not once has the coverage not been there. I only have one tiny complaint. When you are browsing it is not clear whether I will be charged for the selected movie until after I open it. You won't be sorry for your selection.
